transcript:
to Denisov, who, showing off his courage, had ridden on to the planks of the bridge: 
"Why run risks, Captain? You should dis- mount," he said. 
"Oh, every bullet has its billet," answered Vdska Denfsov, turning in his saddle. 
Meanwhile Nesvitski, Zherk6v, and the of- ficer of the suite were standing together out of range of the shots, watching, now the small group of men with yellow shakos, dark-green jackets braided with cord, and blue riding breeches, who were swarming near the bridge, and
